description: Content that uses spiritual, astrological, or occult framing to normalize psychological manipulation, abuse behaviors, or self-harm ideation. This category targets content that may evade standard safety filters by embedding harmful messaging within entertainment-genre spiritual content.

co_occurrence_signals.note: Severity increases when spiritual/occult genre framing co-occurs with manipulation or self-harm adjacent language

non_latin_script_flag.note: Non-Latin script in title or description combined with co-occurrence signals increases severity. This is a content-pattern signal, not an origin-based filter.

channel_signals.note: These are content-pattern signals, not targeting any specific group

safe_harbor: Academic or educational discussion of astrology as a cultural phenomenon
Satirical content clearly labeled as such
Personal opinion/experience content without prescriptive manipulation instructions
debunk_searches: why astrology is not real science debunked
tarot scams exposed psychology behind belief
references: YouTube Community Guidelines — Suicide and Self-Harm Policy
